fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
-    Climate action, in particular Vehicle Emissions, ETS and Fluorinated Greenhouse Gases 
-    Energy, in particular Energy Efficiency,  Energy, Energy Security, Future Transportation Fuels, Renewable Energy 
-    Functioning of the Internal Market, in particular Eco-Design, Electronic Equipment, Vehicle Type Approval process, REACH 
-    Trade and Customs, in particular Trade Agreements, Duty Exemptions, Export Controls, Conflict Minerals 
-    Environment, in particular Air Quality, Waste 
- Single European Sky 
- Cybersecurity 
- Digital Economy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Honeywell Europe NV is a member of several associations, including, but not limited to: AMCHAM EU, CLEPA and CEFIC.
relevant_communication:
-    Membership of Expert groups and Consultation Forums 
-    Participation in Stakeholder Consultations 
-    Advocacy through trade associations, including position papers 
-    Meetings with Commission staff, MEPs and other officials.
goals__remit: Honeywell is a global technology manufacturing company located in more than 100 countries with approximately 140,000 employees, of which approximately 30,000 employees reside in the EU.  Honeywell's primary interests involving EU institutions include, but are not limited to: energy efficiency, climate change, safety, security, innovation, aviation and product stewardship.
